verses.verse: Then the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> near; <S%H7126><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters: <S%H1323><s%> Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> Noah <S%H5270><s%> and Hoglah <S%H2295><s%> and Milcah <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>

And they stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the leaders <S%H5387><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Our father died <S%H1><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4191><s%> yet he was not among <S%H4057><s%> the company <S%H8432><s%> of those who gathered <S%H5712><s%> themselves together against <S%H3259><s%> the Lord <S%H5921><s%> in the company <S%H3068><s%> of Korah; <S%H5712><s%> but he died <S%H7141><s%> in his own sin, <S%H4191><s%> and he had <S%H2399><s%> no <S%H1961><s%> sons. <S%H3808><s%>

"Why <S%H4100><s%> should the name <S%H8034><s%> of our father be withdrawn <S%H1><s%> from among <S%H1639><s%> his family <S%H8432><s%> because <S%H4940><s%> he had <S%H3588><s%> no <S%H369><s%> son <S%H369><s%>? Give <S%H1121><s%> us a possession <S%H5414><s%> among <S%H272><s%> our father's brothers. <S%H8432><s%>"
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> their case <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"The daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> are right <S%H9210><s%> in [their] statements. <S%H1696><s%> You shall surely <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> them a hereditary <S%H5159><s%> possession <S%H272><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their father's brothers, <S%H1><s%> and you shall transfer <S%H251><s%> the inheritance <S%H5674><s%> of their father to them.

"Further, you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'If <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> dies <S%H4191><s%> and has <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> then you shall transfer <S%H5674><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his daughter. <S%H1323><s%>
'And if <S%H518><s%> he has <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>
'And if <S%H518><s%> he has <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> brothers, <S%H251><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his father's brothers. <S%H251><s%>

'And if <S%H518><s%> his father has <S%H1><s%> no <S%H369><s%> brothers, <S%H369><s%> then you shall give <S%H251><s%> his inheritance <S%H5414><s%> to his nearest <S%H5159><s%> relative <S%H7138><s%> in his own family, <S%H7607><s%> and he shall possess <S%H4940><s%> it; and it shall be a statutory <S%H3423><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> to the sons <S%H4941><s%> of Israel, <S%H1121><s%> just <S%H3478><s%> as the Lord <S%H9201><s%> commanded <S%H3068><s%> Moses. <S%H6680><s%>' "

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H5927><s%> up to this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
"And when you have seen <S%H7200><s%> it, you too <S%H1571><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> to your people, <S%H9415><s%> as Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> was;

for in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin, <S%H6790><s%> during the strife <S%H4808><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> you rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H854><s%> My command <S%H6310><s%> to treat <S%H6942><s%> Me as holy <S%H6942><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> at the water. "(These <S%H1992><s%> are the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%> of Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin. <S%H6790><s%>)
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"May the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> appoint <S%H6485><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%>

who <S%H834><s%> will go <S%H3318><s%> out and come <S%H935><s%> in before <S%H6440><s%> them, and who <S%H834><s%> will lead <S%H3318><s%> them out and bring <S%H935><s%> them in, that the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> may not be like sheep <S%H6629><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> shepherd. <S%H7462><s%> "

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> is the Spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and lay <S%H5564><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> on him;

and have him stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation; <S%H5712><s%> and commission <S%H6680><s%> him in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>

"And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of your authority <S%H1935><s%> on him, in order <S%H4616><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may obey <S%H8085><s%> [him.]

"Moreover, he shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who shall inquire <S%H7592><s%> for him by the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the Urim <S%H224><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> At his command <S%H6310><s%> they shall go <S%H3318><s%> out and at his command <S%H6310><s%> they shall come <S%H935><s%> in, [both] he and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, even all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; and he took <S%H3947><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>

Then he laid <S%H5564><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> on him and commissioned <S%H6680><s%> him, just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
